title: IPL Auction
backDetails: Participants strategize and bid with a virtual budget to assemble their ultimate playing XI, creating a balanced team of batsmen, bowlers, and all-rounders.

title: Shipwreck
backDetails: On a hypothetical deserted island, contestants must creatively persuade a judge to save them and secure a spot in the Lifeboat, showcasing their storytelling and quick-thinking abilities.

title: Meme Mania
backDetails: This fun and competitive meme creation event encourages participants to craft humorous content based on a given theme, with the best entries advancing through multiple rounds.

title: Whisper Challenge
backDetails: This session challenges participants to guess silently spoken phrases by lip-reading, all while wearing headphones, promoting teamwork and laughter.

title: Adzap
backDetails: This invites teams to develop and present innovative advertisements based on assigned topics, with the best performances advancing to the next round.
